events.message: We received your application for the Software Engineer position on May 1st. Thank you for your interest in joining our engineering team.
Your application has been reviewed and categorized under the Engineering cluster, as you are applying for the software developer role.
A recruiter specializing in engineering roles has been assigned to assist you through the next steps of our hiring process.
Our team conducted an initial screening interview to better understand your software development experience and skill set.
Thank you for promptly responding with all requested information and confirming your availability for the technical interview.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 10th. You will be interviewed by one of our senior software engineers.
You successfully completed the technical interview with positive feedback on your coding skills and problem-solving approach.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss your cultural fit and general employment terms with our HR team.
You completed the HR interview positively, during which we covered benefits, company values, and your career aspirations.
We have extended a formal offer for you to join our engineering team as a Software Engineer. Please review and respond.
You provided feedback expressing enthusiasm about the role and asked a few clarifying questions about onboarding.
You accepted the offer to join our engineering team, and we are excited to welcome you onboard.
Your onboarding process has started with an orientation session and setup of your developer accounts and tools.
The recruitment process is now complete. You are officially hired as a Software Engineer. Welcome to the team!
